SageTVPlugin.Name: Java Heap Monitor
SageTVPlugin.Description:
Java Heap Monitor for SageTV 7.
Running low on heap space is one of the main causes of "sluggishness" in SageTV. This STVi puts a small bar graph in the menu header which shows how much Java heap space is available.
To configure the STVi navigate to Setup->Detailed Setup->Customize and look for Java Heap Monitor near the end of the list.
